comments.body: old test name?  we're not modifying the treeString anymore, it's just the `SaveIntoDataSourceCommand`

comments.body:
I followed the naming convention here: https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/e9f983df275c138626af35fd263a7abedf69297f/sql/core/src/test/scala/org/apache/spark/sql/execution/DataSourceScanExecRedactionSuite.scala#L33

we are essentially redacting `SaveIntoDataSourceCommand::simpleString` which is called in `SaceIntoDataSourceCommand::treeString`
